amendment.description: An amendment numbered 82 printed in the Congressional Record to make sundry amendments to the limitation paragraph and add at the end of the bill, a new section titled Effective Date.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A062) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Mr. Armstrong raised a point of order against the Takano amendment (A062). Mr. Armstrong stated the provisions of the amendment exceeds the scope of the bill and the amendment is therefore, not germane. Point of order overruled by the Chair.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A062) offered by Mr. Takano.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A062) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
